Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 80th overall pick, by Detroit in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Timothy Egerton (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/2015, off Agustin Vega (SF)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2017, hitting .517 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/2017, hitting .480 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Philadelphia on 7/20/2017...
Sets a new season AL-Record for Hits with 228 on 10/2/2017...
